111.content: Marge, mother of Bart, Lisa, and Maggie Simpson, was living the usual life of her family. Her husband, Homer, was the lazy, hilarious,moronic glutton he always was, Bart was causing chaos, Lisa was engaging her studies, and Maggie was... well being a baby her age while Marge was doing her part in keeping the family together. This backbone that keeps the family alive may shatter after Marge experiences a life changing phenomenon from...

11113.content:
During the night, Marge has a very strange dream. From her point-of-view, she relived random moments of her childhood youth. Like a tape being rewound or put in fast forward, a memory transferred into another without warning. The process lasted for hours. Marge eventually sees, to her confusion, distorted clocks operating in reverse. She also sees her children, Bart, Lisa, and Maggie. She becomes more confused than ever when she noticed Bart and Lisa giving her demonic smirks at her level. To her "children's" delight, they start to grow bigger before her eyes. She turns to Maggie, who has become a giant compared to her. Maggie takes off her pacifier, forming a smile as demonic as possible with her toothless mouth. Marge tries to run away before Maggie captures her with her giant hands. Maggie brings Marge closer to her face. "Maggie, no!" Marge fears for the worst before the horrific images vanished.
Marge wakes up to her bed with Homer (her husband), happy to no longer experience the traumatic nightmare. Before her heart slows down to a normal rate, Marge feels more fear attack her. She sees that the bed she was sleeping on, as well as everything else around her, appears somewhat larger than before. Feeling too shaken up to go back to sleep, she moves out the bed to get some water. While walking out of the bedroom, she trips on something, falling to the ground. Marge looks around, finding out she tripped on her nightgown,which became larger just like the rest of her surroundings. Seeing a connection to her situation, she looks at herself. She becomes paralyzed from terror finding out her body became that of a...
11113.title: overnight

She, then, looks at her body and hands and finds that they have become pudgy and filled with baby fat, confirming that she has turned into a little girl around the age of her own children.
"This can't be real," she whispers to herself. She looks at the alarm clock across the room and almost shrieks upon finding that there is little time to waste before everyone else wakes up. She runs off, carrying her over-sized nightgown with her, to Lisa's room for some fitting clothes. She silently sneaks inside and takes some of her attire from the drawer she would place them whenever she was done with the laundry. She is shocked, if not horrified, to know upon trying them on that they...

11132.content:
Marge acts as busy with her habitual duties as ever. She goes upstairs to put away fresh, cleaned laundry for the family. At the hallway, she sees Lisa looking at her with excitement. "What are you so excited about, Lisa?" Marge asks her 8-year old daughter.
"There's a science project competition this week. I feel I'm going to win this one for sure," Lisa giggles to herself.
"That's great, sweetie!" Marge exclaims, putting down her laundry. Marge hugs her daughter, proud to know she is happy with her accomplishments. Marge picks up the laundry, proceeding to leave Lisa alone when she runs to her.
"Wait! I was wondering if you could help me test my experiment!"
"I'd love to, Lisa. Just let me finish this first," Marge says, referring to the laundry still clenched to her arms.

After finishing the job, Marge walks to the ecstatic Lisa in her room. "What do you need me for, Lisa?"
"I need to you to test this..."

111322.title: something else

1113222.content: If Lisa doesn't want Marge to test an elixir or a remote control, what does she need Marge for?
1113222.title: What kind of experiment is it?

11132221.content:
Marge grows even more curious as to what Lisa is planning. In the room is a giant machine with two open chambers big enough for people to get inside. Marge would have been annoyed by the oil and metal debris piled all over the floor, but she is to awestruck by the giant machine to notice. In the back of her mind, she wonders how Lisa is going to bring the contraption to her school and, strangely, whether she has actually seen such a device before.Thinking about the latter, she recalls something about her son, Bart, and a fly. She dismisses the faint memory as a dream, turning to Lisa. "So I walk into one of these," referring to the chambers, "and come out of another?"
"Yes. I already tried out the device myself and came out fine. I just need to see whether it'll work on someone with a differing corporeal form," she explains with her advanced vocabulary.
Marge feels somewhat nervous but complies, trusting that she will be fine. Marge walks into a chamber, immediately hearing a buzzing sound. The inside of the chamber begins to shine, quickly blocking her sight.Before the chamber gained maximum brightness, Marge notices...
11132221.title: a teleportion device

choices: Lisa takes Baby Marge to school for the project
111322211.content:
All of sudden she felt lighting strike through her body. It was terrifying and exhilarating. She noticed though that she wasn't being sent anywhere. Instead, the machine was... was regressing her. She tried to yell out, but she couldn't control her body none of it. She kept regressing, and regressing, causing her regular attire to engulf her. She had no idea what age she was becoming and couldn't help fearing it. Once it seemed like her clothes were to big, she vanished.

Se reappearing in the next teleporter and the lightning receded, but her clothes had changed. As a result, everything fit again. Her green dress was now a green baby shirt, Her neckless was now a red baby bracelet, her panties were a fluffy white diaper, and her high heels were red baby shoes. As for her body, the only recognizable feature was her blue hair. Her hair no longer went up so long, instead it was curly with a little covering her head. Her arms and legs were covered in baby fat and her chest completely flat. Before the door opened, she could see her silvery reflection and noticed what age she was. She cried loudly, hoping the door would open. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH"

Lisa didn't hear her until the door opened and was amazed. "M-MOM! I-I ow my... I created an adult age regression machine!!!" She ran to her once-mother, picking her up best she could and shaking her back and forth. "Rock a bye baby in the tree top, if she cries the cradle will drop." Marge suddenly calmed down. Lisa relaxed, and said "Maybe if we spin it in reverse, it'll turn you back."

Before Marge could react, Lisa put her back in, but the lightning couldn't reach baby Marge. With her old form, the lightning touched her almost instantly, now however it was nearly impossible. The door opened and Lisa was extremely worried and oddly excited. "I can't believe it. I, Lisa Simpson, created a machine that turns adults permanently into babies! This is world changing! Good thing I got it all on tape"

Marge then cried again and Lisa unexpressed said "And.. I turned my mother into a baby. Great..." She comforted Marge again and then went through Maggie's room, looking for an extra pacifier. Luckily, she found one and stuck it in Marge's mouth. Things calmed down and Lisa exhaustingly said "now what?"
111322211.title: Baby Marge is born!

15311.content: Which age will our lovely Kira regress to?
15311.title: All Grown Up

choices: Kimi has to take care of her mom
153111.content:
Kira and Kimi were out of town for a mother daughter trip. The trip would last about a week, give or take. At first the two got into an argument, which was very unusual.

"Come on mom, why can't I get my ears pieced? Its perfectly normal."

"Well, I don't care how normal it is. Your only a middle school, which is way too young. You'll have to wait until you're older."

Kira didn't want to talk after that point. She knew she wouldn't get the piercing by arguing. The two kept quiet for the remainder of the car ride; Kira put on some music though to lighten the mood.

Kimi just looked out the window with a scowl on her face. Once the two got to their cabin house, Kimi quickly got her things and dropped them in a room. She went outside to get some peace and alone time.

"Augh, she's always being the buzzkill in my life. If only I could stop her from being this way." Then as Kimi tilted her head up, she spotted a well. "Eh, what the heck."

She went up to the well and thought about a wish. 'I wish... I wish my mom would stop telling me what to do."

Little did Kimi know that the wish did work, just not the way she wanted it to. Kimi stayed outside for a bit, not actually believing the wish would work. Meanwhile, Kira was in the queen bed room, reading a book trying to get her mind off of Kimi."

She thought to herself, "This will end. She never stays mad for too long. Just check on her later."

After she said that, she started reading her book. Little did she know that regression was happening. It was gradual at first, moving at a regress speed of 1 age per minute. 7 ages down, Kira decided to get a drink of water. She felt a little odd. She was shorter than normal and she could of sworn her blouse was a couple sizes bigger. Her clothes were changing with her though, so it was hard to tell. While she was up the regression wildly sped up, moving to 3 ages in 30 seconds. After getting a drink of water she looked in her bathroom mirror and was flabbergasted. The 36 year old woman looked like she was 16. Not just that, after careful focus she could tell that she was still regressing. Fear started to climb over her, wondering when the regression would stop. She rushed out of the bathroom, only to be even more shocked. Her room had changed, giving the answer. She was regressing to a... to a.. baby.

Her room now had a crib, and changing table. White comfy diapers were stacked of the changing table, along with wipes, powders, and lotions. In the dresser, the clothes she already put away were shrunk to baby size. Her purse was now a pink diaper bag with bottles, pacifiers, and baby lotions. Everything had changed so fast and by the time she was done looking she was age 7. She ran to get Kimi, but she tripped in the living room and started crying. She failed, and in about a minute she was only a 1 year old. Her cries turned into wails at that age. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

As for her clothing, she only wore two things. A lavender baby t-shirt and a big comfy diaper. Kimi was just getting inside when the regression finished. She heard the cries and rushed over to the sound. She was perplexed "Huh, what are you doing here? Mom! Theres a baby in the house. Whose is it?"

Kira could still understand her daughter and cried even louder, hearing the question. Kimi heard no response and assumed outloud "Oh great, she's probably knee deep in some book." Then Kimi looked down at the baby, and warmly asked "Whats the matter baby? Did you hurt yourself?"

Kira only nodded. "Oh, well don't you worry about that." Kimi bent down and kissed the baby's leg. "Its all better. Now come with me, my mom will know what to do." Kimi picked up her babified mom and cradled her on the way.

Kira calmed down, putting a thumb in her mouth on the way. Kimi checked the only other room, the one her mom was staying in. It finally hit her. She turned to the baby, and asked "M-mom is that you?"

Kira, with tears in her eyes, nodded 'yes.'

Kimi was stunned. "Ok, everythings cool. Just mom is a baby. Its cool, its cool. She still remembers who she is. I can fix this, I can fix this."

While she said those things, Kira couldn't control herself and pooped in her diaper.
153111.title: A wittle baby. 1 year old

1531111.content:
After Kimi said "I can fix this." she heard a loud fart noise from her mom's diaper. Kimi reacted like many teenagers would "Ew, ew, ew, ew, EEEEEWW!!"

Her screams quickly caused her mom to tear up and wail. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!"

Kira's crying snapped Kimi out of her worry. "Right, right. You don't need that right now. You need a new diaper. Now where are they... Ah there they are."

Kimi carried her mom to the changing table and softly said "There, there It's alright mom, I'll be you're mommy this week."

She then unstrapped the diaper and was blasted with a terrible smell. She wanted to scream, but that would only make things worse. So, she quickly removed the diaper. Then, in a confused manner she wiped her mom's butt and applied baby powder. "There, almost done." Lastly, she strapped a new diaper in place.
1531111.title: Kimi has to take care of her mom

15311111.content:
After Kimi finished she picked up Kira, carrying he by the waste and petting her hair. "Good girl, don't want any dirty diapers making this situation worse."

The comment was a little insensitive and Kira started to tear up, "waaaaaaaaa"

Kimi wipe her tears away, "Hey, hey, I didn't mean it like that. I meant ah.. let's get you something to drink."

Kimi carried her mom to the kitchen fridge and found full warm baby bottles. "Wow, why is everything so... conveniently placed."

Then Kimi realized... "Oh no... not that. I didn't mean this."

Her mom titled her head "Goga?"

Kimi blushed, "well, I just realized that my wish came true.. I kinda wished you couldn't tell me what to do, and now you, well, you can't."

Kira was starting to have a temper tantrum, but Kimi interrupted it with the baby bottle. "Haha, now it seems I can tell you what to do."

15331.content: What age will they go to?
15331.title: Both Kira and Charlotte

153311.content:
Kira, Charlotte, and Diane all went out for a mother weekend. Unfortunately, Elizabeth was too busy and couldn't come that week. They were a little sad, but then again Elizabeth wasn't interested in many feminine stuff to begin with.

After the three of them set up there things in the hotel, they went to a nearby fair. The three dressed warm and casual, wearing red, pink, and orange. They were having fun together with several rides for the first several hours. Then Kira spotted a magic show playing in the next 10 minutes. The three had to enter an auditorium for the show, and surprisingly each had to sign a waver, stating they are fine with any of the effects that will go from the show. Kira and Diane thought it would be fun, but Charlotte saw it as a 'stupid waste of time.' After signing the waver forms, Charlotte said "That was probably to make it seem like real magic would happen. Its a tactic several magic shows employ nowadays."

Kira responded "Even so, this does look like a lot of fun. You wanna go on stage for an act. I'm sure it will be worth the fee."

"Oh, whatever fine. Its for fun anyways."

They sat in their seats and the magician soon started casting typical magical moves. Some people, like Kira and Diane, were impressed, while others, like Charlotte, put on a clearly fake smile.

The magician could see these outliers and soon became agitated. "It would seem some in this crowd are unimpressed. Perhaps, I should show some more unseen magic. To do so though, I'll need two guests."

Kira was quick to raise her hand. "Oh! OH! Do me and my friend" she said this while raising Charlotte's hand.

The magician could tell Charlotte was one of these outliers, so he agreed. This would be righteous he thought. The two mothers got on stage, one was obviously eager and the other was skeptical.

"Hmm.. I'm planning on making a transformation you see. What similarities might there be in between thee. Before I do, might I ask, what are your names ladies?"

Kira was ecstatic and responded for the both of them. "You may. I'm Kira and this is my friend Charlotte."

"Awww, both of those names are pretty. So which one of you will it be?

Kira raised her hand, if she was in school. The Magician gave a chuckle, "Hmm.. I wonder who to pick" Then Kira started making more motion to get attention.

Magician laughed louder "My, my you certainly are a happy one. This isn't school, but I'll allow this gesture. Now, what do you two have in common."

Kira pointed to herself, "ahh, you mean me?"

"Why yes..."

"Awesome, well first I'd like to say thank you so much for picking us. Me and my friend are both mothers."

"Hmm.. Excellent. Well, you wouldn't mind getting in this here photo booth?" A photo booth suddenly emerged from smoke. The two weren't impressed, though Kira acted impressed. Once they were in, the Magician said "Who knows what shall happen to our lovely guests." For both their sakes, the box had tons of space in it.

Right then the inside felt odd. Kira knocked on the door, but it wouldn't open and she couldn't hear anyone. Just seconds ago she could, but all of sudden she couldn't. Meanwhile, the outside couldn't hear a peep.

Charlotte was becoming annoyed "Why couldn't you just watch instead?"

"I-I'm sorry, didn't think this would happen. But, I'm sure, this is just part of the act."

"Maybe.." Charlotte said exhaustively

Time passed by though, what seemed like 10 minutes in the booth was only 2 minutes outside. The two women started to notice the other shrinking and both said "Do you feel strange?" The other responded "No, why?" Kira spoke independently first "Wait.. why are you asking?"

Charlotte said "Because you're shrinking."

Kira said "Odd, I was going to say the same thing about you." Then the two were scared, but they noticed each others flatter chests. Charlotte said "Um.. I don't think we're shrinking.. we're regressing."

Once it hit them, both of them screamed. Charlotte was the first to get her composure "Wha-what age do you think we'll hit?"

Kira started answering, "I-I don't know" then she cut herself off "WAIT! The similarity I gave him was that we're both mothers. That's why we're regressing, because of irony."

Charlotte suddenly got very angry and started hitting the door "RRRRR... LET US OUT!!" Crazily, no one on the opposite end heard it.

The two of them were in their late 20s when they entered and by this time Charlotte banged on the door, they were in their early teen years.

Kira looked at her clothing and got even more concerned. She put her hand on Charlotte's shoulder. "Um.. Charlotte..?"

Charlotte turned and angrily said "Yes?!"

"Look at our clothes, they still fit us..and they'r-they're changing with us. Also, we look like teenagers.." Kira was getting more fearful as they regressed, while Charlotte couldn't contain her angry. Before either of them knew it, they were between ages 5-6. Kira was crying about now. "W-w-we were tricked... theres no way out.." Charlottes anger was essentially a temper tantrum at this point, similar to Angelica's. She stomped her feet up and down in a high pitched voice "This is not fair. Not FAIR!"

The tantrums soon stopped though, because Charlotte lost her energy; she was becoming reluctant. At this point the regression was slowing down, and they each were about 3 years old. They not only were high pitched, but pronunciation was a challenge. The two of them could only sit on the bottom or crawl.

Charlotte sat on her but, with her legs stretched out as far as possible. In a resigned expression, she said "Faaaa-ine, I gwuess we wost. Any mowent now, we'll be babies." Its at this point Charlotte finally paid attention to Kira and noticed her crying.

Kira was laying on her tummy, crying loudly "Its dwoomed. We'll neva see our childwen again!!" Charlotte's expression changed to one of concern.

Charlotte held Kira's chubby little hands "Ha-hey now. It-its not all bad. Dianwa is hea. Pwus, this means no wowk."

Kira stopped crying to look up to Charlotte. She brushed the water from her eye lids and sat up best she could. "Yowa wight." The two of them came in for a huge. and by this point the transformation was complete; both were 1 year olds. Kira was wearing a purple baby t-shirt, Charlotte was wearing a red baby t-shirt. Besides that the only thing both were wearing was fluffy comfy diapers. Instead of purses, they each had a baby bag in their respective color; Kira had purple and Charlotte had red. They're wallets remained, each with an extra signed check of course; these checks had the magician's signature, both signed for 1 million dollars. This would be needed to pay for their new lives. Other than their wallets, each baby bag had a plethora of baby necessities such as, pacifiers, extra diapers, baby bottles, lotions, powder, and stuffed animals. One more item remained, a double seated pink stroller magically behind them when they hit babyhood. Both baby bags were hanging on the handles. Finally after being regressed, they could hear the outside;it was like they entered a different realm during regression.

During the regression process, the pretty magic assistant waved her hands while circling the door. The magician was touching the booth with his wand and shouting stuff to the crowd during this. "So.. our two guests were quite pretty mothers weren't they. Well, what is the opposite of that?"

Tons of people shouted out ideas, but the Magician kept his smurk until he heard someone questioningly say "Babies?"

"Very right!" the Magician exclaimed. "The reason being mothers usually take care of babies. It was a tricky question ya see."

This made Diane, who was in the crowds, a little nervous. "You mean you transformed them into.."

"Yep, I turned them both into babies! 1 year olds to be exact! And you there?"

He pointed back at Diane. She confusingly said "M-me"

"Certainly. The park footage shows you very close with these two. Are you their friend by chance?"

Diane said with a little hesitation "Yes.."

The Magician smirked "Well, not anymore!" He opened the door, causing a burst of crowd reactions. He shouted over them "NOW DIANE, YOU ARE THEIR MOTHER!!"
153311.title: Kira and Charlotte AR

155332211121.title: How's the housewife turn into a baby?

Francine convinces Hayley to take care of her for now.
1553322111211.content:
It was another one of those two week CIA mission-a-thons and as per usual Francine went on some sort of tirade with her husband gone. Stan had only been gone for less than an hour and she was already brooding over her husbands long-ish exit.

She couldn't help but go browsing through old pictures taken during past mission-a-thons. "I can't believe it. Again, another mission-a-thon! I wish he'd give me a heads up next time."

Klaus then scooted in with his bowl. "Still upset about Stan being gone Francine?"

Francine immediately got snippy "What do you mean by "still?"

Klaus sighed "Augh, you don't seem to realize that this is a yearly occurrence do you? Stan leaves without saying anything and then you get all emotional."

"What are you talking about?!"

"Francine.. look through that picture book. How many times has this happened?"

Francine started to count with a scowl on her face as the reality became increasingly sober. "Oh my god.."

Klaus smiled "Yes, now you see getting upset is a waste. So come downstairs and we can watch my-"

Francine cut him off. "Screw whatever you were going to tell me Klaus. You made me realize how much of my young years I've wasted!"

Klaus face-palmed with his fin. "What are you going to do about it then?"

Francine charged out. "I don't know, but I'm sure the CIA has something for me."

After she left, Klaus just said to himself "Augh, no one wants to watch my audio drama..."

----------

Francine charged into the CIA science lab. "Listen up boys, I want something to get my beauty years back. They've been wasted while my husband goes play mission-a-thon."

The one scientist chuckled to this statement. "Francine.. what are you talking about? You look great. Why would you want to go back in years?"

Francine became suddenly hostile, grabbing him by the shirt collar. "Listen up, I know my husband probably told you not to give anything. But are you really in the mood to be beaten up by a housewife?"

The scientist gulped, realigning his glasses. "Well.. then again, there is something I could give you."

Francine released her hold on him. "What is it?"

"It's makeup designed to make someone younger. Some agents put a little of this on their wives for birthdays. Though.. we've never actually given it to their wives directly."

Francine frowned noticeably "So, what difference does it make?"

The scientist smirked "Not much, just means you need to sign a waver is all."

Francine suddenly grew a smile. "That's all?!"

"Yes, but remember only to use a little of this stuff. It's strong and one puff on each cheek should be enough."

Francine ignored his warning, taking the pink makeup container and signing the waver. "Thanks doc. You won't be hearing from me again."

The scientist sighed "I wish that was true..."

----------

Francine drove as fast as she could home, driving past the speed limit to experience what could possibly be the best day of her life. Fortunately, she didn't run into any cops. Once home, she slammed her car door, locked up, and bolted into the house. She raced to her make up mirror and started dabbing the age make up on her face. Within seconds, she had already puffed cheek at least 10 times. She did it so fast, that the effects didn't really take affect until after she stopped.

After those first puffs of the makeup, she got some nerve and put it down. She observed with glee as her face de-aged before her eyes. While the effects would be enormous, they did occur slow enough for her to observe changes. Within a minute, she had seen her fourty year old face turn to that of a thirty year old. She was ecstatic! With glee, she said "I'm BEAUTIFUL AGAIN!"

Seconds later her daughter, Hayley stormed into her room. "Mom! Have you lost it?!"

Francine gave only a cocky response. "No Hayley, the opposite. I've gained it. I've gained my youthful appearance. I'm even prettier than you now."

Hayley was extremely confused by this response and then she started to realize her mom was younger. Not only that, she realized her mom was getting even younger. "Mom.. what did you do?"

"Nothing Hayley. I just went to the CIA and got makeup that would allow me to experience my youth!"

Hayley started to notice the effects speed up for some reason as her Mom approached her early twenties. "Mom! How much of that stuff did you use?!!"

As Francine gave a reply, she slipped through to the age of 10 "Like 10 puffs or so, why? Do I look even prettier?! Hehe!!" Her attitude was becoming increasingly more childish with each word.

Hayley couldn't think but to yell at her mom, hoping to get her concern. "MOM! WHAT WERE YOU THINKING?!! You're even younger than me now!!"

Francine hit the age of 1, before she could even respond "Ha! Den me am pwettia den yowa!! Hehe! Now-wha ya gonna do?!"

Hayley's face was extremely concerned and she could only think to do one thing; she picked up her mom by the waist and showed the new baby to a mirror.

Francine was taken a-back by her daughter lifting her up so.. authoritatively. The difference in their height didn't really strike her until this, causing her to keep quiet with a somewhat concerned face.

She then saw her reflection. Her face turned to one of shock. She just stared at her reflection in disbelief. Her joy suddenly cut down to nothinglessness. After a second of paused disbelief, she touched the mirror with her chubby hands and felt the cold glass as if it were an alien object. Suddenly tears started to sprout and with them came wails thereafter.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!"

Hayley internally criticized her for this. She wanted to get her attention, not cause a water show. To calm her mom, she tried to talk motherly "It's okay Mom, don't worry. I got you. You're okay."

Francine paused briefly to look up at her daughter's now huge face and then continued to wail.

Hayley sighed and tried using heavier duty tactics. This time she cradled her mom, rocking her back and forth and sang in an angelic tone "There there, there is no reason to worry. I have you, you have me. I will keep you all happy, please do not worry."

After the cradles, Francine calmed down slightly and the song afterward prevented her from devolving into another wail.

What now?
1553322111211.title: Housewifes plus Magic Makeup Do Not Mix Well

choices: Hayley defends keeping Francine like this to Steve.
15533221112112.content:
Hayley laid her baby mother on her parents' bed and gave a ginormous sigh. "Augh.. why me?"

Francine pouted adorably, lifting her arms "No. Yowa howlda me no-wa."

Hayley took a deep breath "Okay mom." and held the little one in her arms as she laid down."

Francine pouted again "No."

Hayley asked in a concerned tone "What now?"

"Me nah mom no-wa."

Hayley glared at the little one. "No. You are. I'm not letting you pretend you're something else."

Francine slowly started to form tears in response to that.

"Okay! Okay! I'll call you baby mom. Does that work?"

Francine gave an adorably disappointed response. "Me gess, but ca me caw you mommy?"

Hayley just facepalmed. "Okay baby mom."

Francine just gave an adorable "YAY!"

"Augh, are you happy now?"

Francine giggled "May-we, bu me wanna diapee chan-ga no-wa."

"You're kidding.."

"Me nah kiddin. Chan me no-wa!"

"Mom! I'm not getting used to this!"

Francine started to get sad again, but before she broke out into a wail this time, she was interrupted by a doorbell.

The doorbell stopped both their train of thoughts and Hayley quickly covered her mom up in her pink dress as if it was a baby blanket.

Hayley raised to the door, opening it without a second thought. "Hello, how can I help you?"

It was normal looking mover guy with brown hair and blue eyes. "Hi there, um Mrs. Smith, I have hear an order for a room decoration. We're ready to work and just need a signature."

Hayley was somewhat dumbfounded "Room decoration? For what?"

The mover guy looked at her confused. "For your baby girl maim, the one your holding in your arms right now."

"Oh right" Hayley tried to pass it off like she forgot, but then she couldn't help but ask "Wait, what? I never ordered this."

"We were called earlier today by Mr. Smith over at the CIA Laboratory that he needed us to come here stat."

Hayley scowled, thinking to herself "That damn scientist is going to pay."

"Maim?" Hayley seemed to zone out for a second there.

"Right, well I am not signing this. My husband has lost his mind."

"Maim, your husband told us everything. You've had this baby for a week and refuse to give her a room. For the sake of all that is decent, please sign this."

Francine jumped in after this "Pweese mommy.."

From the guilt and the adorableness, Hayley couldn't help but sign it. Almost seconds after, the mover guys got straight to work, moving out furniture from her parents room and replacing it with baby attire.

When everything was all said and done, the room looked nothing like before. Even the wall and floor were colored differently (thanks to a newfangled CIA included technology of course that allowed it to try almost instantly.)

The wall was now a light pink and the floors were a light colored blue. There was a completely pink crib leaned up horizontally to the wall where her parents bed once stood. Light colored pink sheets, blankets, and pillows littered it's insides. Above the crib was an ocean themed mobile. Most of the corners were littered with bright colored stuffed animals. One of their drawers, the drawers of her former husband were now a changing station. Her drawers were filled with assortments of baby attire. It goes without saying, both of these pieces of furniture were colored in a bright pink same as the crib. Several packs of diapers, roughly seven were placed near the new changing table. If matters weren't worse enough, they also put a new pink high chair in the kitchen along with some baby food.

These guys couldn't be just movers, they had to be in on the truth somehow.

Within 2 hours of them starting, everything was done. Hayley watched in horror and Francine watched in joy as both of their lives were dramatically changed.

After she saw the damage, Hayley was speechless. Something broke the silence though. Rodger came down from the basement with Klaus and Klaus shouted "We are trying to watch my audio drama! Why are you so-"

Klaus cut himself off. Rodger spoke up. "Oh man! This is so priceless! I thought I was going to be stuck watching that crappy audio drama, but this, this is PRICELESS."

Rodger then pinched Francine's cheeks and in a comical manner said "Hey Franny, don't you think you're missing something?"

Francine just asked innocently in a high pitched voice "Wha Wodga?"

Rodger cracked up "A diaper!!"

Francine then looked up at Hayley "Wew, mommy, chan-ga me den."

Rodger's laughter stopped after that. As Hayley took her to the changing table with dread, Rodger covered Francine's ears. "What happened to the little one?"

Hayley didn't move her eyes from Francine, as she unwrapped the little one and lifted her legs. As she stared deathly into the horror that was her mom's naked behind, she said "She used makeup to be younger and it backfired. Heavily.."

Rodger uncomfortably said "Well... I'll leave you two love birds to it then. Come on Klaus, let's go finish that audio drama. It's better than this."

This snapped him out of his shock and the two went upstairs to finish it, trying to ignore what they just learned.

As the two left, Hayley started applying baby powder and lotion with the same glare. The process was somewhat delayed though due to an innocent question. Francine asked "Mommy.. why are you angry at me?"

Hayley took a deep breath and tried to change her facial expression. "No baby mo- sweetie, I'm angry at someone else. I'm sorry I made you feel that way though." Something in her broke after that question. She couldn't keep up the idea that this baby, this bubbling 1 year old was her mother. Of course, she knew that was the case, but thinking about it didn't make her feel any better. The best she could do to stay sane was act as if this was a baby girl, not just any baby girl, her baby girl.

Francine responded rather innocently "K.. yowa scaw-ed me mommy."

This broke Hayley even more, causing the twenty-something to get tear-y eyed and smile "I'm sorry sweetie. I didn't mean it. I'll try to act better for you, alright."

Francine gave an adorably innocent "Kay" in response to that.

After that response, Hayley strapped a nice cushion-y diaper into place and fit a light pink shirt over Francine's chest. Francine at this point was unrecognizable to her past self. This wasn't a 40 something housewife. This was a 1 year old baby with a twenty-something stoner mother.

Now what?

choices: Okay sure. Let's do that instead.
No. Stick to Hayley feeding Francine please.

155332211121121.title: Wait wait, One more Choice!!

1553322111211211.content:
Hayley's heart raced after her mother's adorable response. "Sweetie, we have a problem.."

Francine tilted her head in adorable confusion "huh?"

"How am I going to keep you like this? We need revenue. Something that can allow you to stay like this."

Francine didn't quite understand. "Bu we gots da makeup, wight?"

Hayley formed a menacing smile. "Good idea sweetie! So, mommy is going to be right back. You just play with your stuffed animals, kay?"

Francine giggled infectiously "Hehe, kay mommy!" She first pulled out a stuffed dolphin and started hugging it tightly. It was so comfy and warm. This was so much more relaxing of a life. Why didn't she do this years ago she thought to her baby self.

Seconds later, Hayley came in with her laptop and started typing up a waver. "Sweetie, how would you like to have playmates?"

Francine bounced up and down with delight "Yay! Pway!!"

So, in a spitting 10 seconds Hayley wrote up a waver, one that had so many words on page that it wasn't the easiest to read. "This will make sure your playmates can't sue us sweetie!"

Francine pondered for a second "Wha sa sue?"

In response, Hayley picked up the baby girl and rocked her back and forth "You'll find out when you're older sweetie.. If you become older..."

Then Hayley printed out copies of another form she had written quickly, calling for all twenty-somethings with mother and daughter issues. Seconds later, she situated Francine in a pink stroller and put up the flyers. As she was putting up one of the flyers, a twenty something brunette stopped her.

"Awww, what an adorable baby!! What's her name?"

Hayley smiled "This here is little Francine. She's a sweet ball of joy."

"I'll say! Why are you and the little one out today? Going to the park I imagine."

Hayley chuckled a little bit "Maybe if we have some time later today, we'll go. I just was putting up flyers though." Hayley then handed her a flyer.

The girl looked at it briefly, "Wow, really? You're a mom-daughter counselor?"

Hayley lit up, "Yes! I've read a whole lot of books on the topic before I had this little gem here. Would you be interested?"

"Oh my god, YES! My mom has been killing me lately! She's going on and on about how shes paying for my college and I should be more respectful. Would you have an opening today by chance?" She replied enthusiastically

"Actually, you're in luck, I have relatively free schedule today. What time works best for you?"

"Thank you thank you thank you! Can I do anything in return?"

Hayley smirked :"Yeah, can you help me put up the rest of these flyers?"

"Will do! I'm Bridgette by the way and my mom is Sarah."

"That's a great help. Thank you. I'm Hayley by the way. Just call your mom and we can set it up instantly."

"Ooh, got it. One sec."

----------

"Hey mom, you got a sec?"

"Awesome! So, I just pumped into a mother-daughter counselor and she has an opening. Could we do it in about an hour or so?"

"Augh, yes mom. We need to do this. You've been on my back for the past several months. We're doing this."

"I am not! Take that back!!"

"Fine. I'll text you the location in a second. See you then." Bridgette then hung up to her mom and faced Hayley. "You have no idea what I deal with. Anywho, text me the location so I can text her."

"Alright. Here it is." Hayley just showed her phone with the address.

"Fantastic, that's right nearby! One sec, I'm texting the coordinates." A minute later, Bridgette got off her phone. "Thank you again. You can actually go back home. I'll put out the rest of the flyers for you."

Hayley was a little surprised. "Thank you. I'll see you later then."

As Hayley strolled away she noticed that little Francine was fast asleep. "Awww, sweet dreams sweetie. When you wake up, you'll have a playmate."

Hayley quickly tucked Francine into her little crib and proceeded to get ready, setting up the living room to look nice.

What now?
1553322111211211.title: Why Only One Housewife Baby? Why not More?!

choices: Hayley has to silence Bridgette to keep her mouth shut
Bridgette grows fond of her baby mom and puts in a good word for Hayley
15533221112112111.content:
A little bit sooner than expected, Bridgette and Sarah knocked on the door. By the time this happened, Hayley was wearing a professional white blouse and black skirt with her hair tucked bad in a pony tail. She was trying to seem as professional as possible, to reel them in.

She took a deep breath and opened the door. "Hi Bridgette and Sarah! Come in! Let's get started."

Sarah immediately snipped at her daughter "You told her my name? Why'd you do that Bridgette?"

Bridgette just sighed "Because it's the nice thing to do mom..."

"Well, you two seem a little at odds. Please come sit." Hayley's act was solid.

"Sit on the couch? What kind of counselling is this? This is just a regular home."

"Yes, about that.. I'm sorry I can't have something more professional. I'm just starting out and so this is the best I can manage."

"An amateur are you?"

"Mom! What's wrong with you?! Be nice for crying out loud."

"Fine. Dear." Sarah responded

Hayley then started her pitch. "So, before we begin, can both of you sign this waver? You see I've had some rather impolite clients in the past and they've sued me on several areas. This is simple procedure though."

Bridgette was horrified by that. "That's aweful! Absolutely, come on mom. Let's sign it." Bridgette signed it immediately, but her mom was not budging.

"I am not signing anything until I know what is on it. That's the smart thing to do dear."

This devolved into a shouting match between Bridgette and Sarah. "Oh my gosh mom, just sign it. She already explained everything to us!"

"No, she didn't!"

"YES SHE DID!"

"NO SHE DIDN'T!!"

"SIGN IT RIGHT NOW MOM! YOU PROMISED!!"

Sarah felt caught now. "FINE!"

She signed it and it was final.

Hayley maintained her composure "Thank you both. Now, the philosophy I adhere to involves empathy."

Bridgette was intrigued, but Sarah was having none of it. "Ooo.."

"So, that means the two of you will need to switch roles. One moment, I need to get you situated Sarah."

"Get me situated? Situated with what?"

"You're costume. This makeup will make you seem younger for this exercise."

"Fine..."

Hayley then started puffing Sarah's two cheeks about a dozen times.

Afterward, Sarah coughed a little from the makeup. "Ah, don't you think that's a little much?!"

"Mom, calm down."

"Fine."

After she said fine though, it started happening. Sarah starting regressing at an alarming rate, even more so than Francine.

Sarah was quick to notice as she fell from her forties to her teens in the span of 30 seconds. "What is happening to me?!!"

Bridgette was confused "What no-"

She cut herself off. "Wait.. what is happening to you?"

Sarah's age started fading even faster, hitting the ripe age of 1 within 20 seconds. Her voice gradually shrank to a high pitched squeak in mid response. "I'm getting YONGA!"

By the time she said that last phrase, she had already hit babyhood. She then instinctively yelled at Hayley "WHA YA DO TA-"

Hayley just plucked a light blue pacifier in her mouth to shut her up. "There there, you're mommy will take care of you now?"

Bridgette was speechless, but couldn't help to ask "A-a-am I her mommy?"

Hayley chuckled "Yea. This is part of the exercise remember?"

"Oh so, you'll turn her back afterward?"

"No. You actually are her mommy now. I'll give you a pack of diapers on the house and show you how to change diapers though. Oh, and, I need my pay."

Hayley then pulled Sarah's wallet out of her purse and said "There, all better. Now, come with me."

What now?

155332222221121.title: Cadence! Another Baby Alicorn!
