Cadence has lost her mind! She wants to be young again!
1553322222211211.content: How is our princess of love going to shrink down to size?
1553322222211211.title: To babyhood?! How's it happen?!

choices: Flurry Heart proceeds to take care of Cadence, attracting wide attention.
Cadence grows more infantile in her responses, attracting a wide audience.
15533222222112111.content:
As much as either of them regretted this decision, Shining Armor was needed for defense at a different part of the kingdom. Even the couples' trusty Sunburst was needed for magical assistance.

While a guard fleet was stationed in the Crystal Empire, they weren't prepared for problems to spawn from within the city. The crazy turn of events happened a couple days after Shining Armor and the others left.

It was a foggy morning and Cadence was waiting for the baby monitor to go off. She had been awake for about 30 minutes and already got some coffee to wake up. It kept her energy up a little, but it paled in comparison to her husband. Love was her motivator, the thing that got her up out of bed. She wasn't used to these mornings where she was alone. As she sat in her throne room, staring into nothinglessness while trying to maintain strength, the baby monitor finally went off.

This was music to hear ears. Even if her husband was gone, the little one gave her plenty of strength. She calmly went into Flurry Heart's room though, holding that energy in for playful enthusiasm. "Morning Flurry Heart, how'd my little bundle of love sleep?"

Flurry Heart gave a big joyous smile at seeing her mommy. She knew she would come. As always, Cadence quickly preceded to a diaper change. After all, little Flurry Heart had a tendency to leave surprises in the morning. The diaper change actually took a teensy bit longer than normal. It was weird too. Flurry Heart didn't even have a mess. Rather, Cadence was trying to savor the love she was receiving as much as possible.

That's when it happened. Flurry Heart got annoyed and started charging her horn up. Cadence saw this and immediately concern hit her. Flurry Heart's magic was supposed to be under control. Perhaps.. with Sunburst away, the safety precautions were too weak. Cadence wasn't going to let what happened to her kingdom before happen again though. So, Cadence had touched her horn with Flurry Hearts and charged power of her own, trying to cancel Flurry's power out. However, Flurry only giggled in response and casted a confusing spell.

The spell unknown to either of them was sucking age away from Cadence and into Flurry Heart. The speed of age transfer.soon kicked up though and Cadence started realizing that something more than just a magic standoff was going on. She tried to pull her horn away, but she couldn't stop it. Meanwhile, Flurry Heart was looking more like a kid than a baby. Cadence took a glance at her baby look older and tried pulling back even harder, using her wings to flap away. This was futile. Flurry Heart merely copied in her mother's hoofsteps, flapping her own wings. As this transfer happened Flurry Heart started sucking her mother's knowledge. If this cycle were to continue to it's conclusion, Cadence would have all her memory, but understand very little to none of it's meaning.

Seconds into the wing flapping contest, Cadence started flying up to get more distance, but Flurry Heart merely did the same. Cadence looked at her daughter grow to Twilight's age and further. Flurry's expression was weird though. It was nothing but a big happy smile. She knew what she was doing and found it just fun to do. Upon seeing this, Cadence quietly teared up. She was a failure of a mother. Her daughter was doing something massively inappropriate, but found it fun.

As Cadence's age depleted more, causing her to reach the tender age of childhood, her wing strength depleted and her tears increased ever more. She wanted to say something to Flurry Heart. She wanted to tell her daughter to stop this instant. But doing so meant, she'd have to stop everything else she was doing and thus give in. As her tears increased and toddlerhood approached her, she couldn't help but take the risk. She stopped her magic, she stopped her wings, and with that almost every shred of her age had depleted her; she was almost the same exact age as her daughter used to be. Any second longer and she'd lose her knowledge of every last word in her dictionary or the ability to speak said words. Fortunately for her, her one command pushed through "STAHP!"

Immediately, Flurry Heart stopped and her expression changed to one of confusion. Her mother was now a baby and wailing on the ground.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!"

Flurry Heart just gave a motherly smile and picked her up with a magical aura. "It's okay mom. I gotcha." Flurry Heart's voice had a similar vibe to that of Pinkie's.

Cadence stopped for a second to see her now grown up daughter looking down on her. Then she simply switched back to wailing up a storm.

Flurry Heart had empathy, but her playful nature prevented her from truly cutting the jokes. She simply gave a motherly smile and said "Oh, silly mom. There's no need to fear. Flurry Heart is here!"

Cadence's wails only increased. Flurry Heart then looked a little frustrated. "Ya know mom, you can quit it. This isn't fun anymore. You're being such a buzzkill."

Nothing changed, so Flurry Heart became even more frustrated. "Augh, fine, I'll cradle you.. even though you don't deserve it."

The cradling calmed Cadence down a little bit, but she still looked sad. Flurry Heart felt something odd when looking at her mom this time though. Her mom looked cute. She had never seen her mother this way. Cuteness was something that others saw in her, but now it was the other way around. The cuteness of her mom was so strong, she couldn't help but giggle joyfully. "Hehe, you are so cute mom! Such a cutey patotey, aren't ya?!"

Flurry Heart almost on instinct then blew a raspberry into Cadence's tiny little tummy. This cheered up Cadence for a little bit, causing her to giggle from laughter. After a while, Flurry Heart then felt like hugging her mom, so she did that. While the now older daughter hugged her baby mom, Cadence finally spoke up in a high pitched baby voice with a bit of an attitude. "Dis no fun missy!'

Flurry Heart was a little scared by this. Her mom never talked to her that way. Flurry Heart reflexively plopped Cadence on the changing table she was just on and covered her face with her wings. In a tear-y response, Flurry Heart said "Why are you yelling at me mom?" She may have been an adult, but she didn't know how to act like one. Here she was, a now grown adult, cowering to a baby.

Cadence was extremely confused by her daughters' response. In her she felt some sympathy, but she didn't want to give into it. Her baby instincts overcame her better judgement and exploded. She wanted to, she needed to, get out this frustration. "WHY?! YOWA TUR ME INTA BABY DAT WHY?!"

Flurry Heart continued to cower. "I'm sorry.. I thought it was fun..."

"FU-NA?! WHA ABOWT ME?! YOWA HAF TA TINK ABOWT ODAS FEE-WINGS!!"

Flurry Heart was going to continue to apologize, but something in her ticked. She knew how she was feeling. She felt bad, really bad. And who was causing it? Her mom of all ponies! The same pony who just said to think about others feelings.

Flurry Heart lashed back at her mother after a couple seconds of Cadence's last response. "What about my feelings mom?! You just said I should think about others feelings and here you are yelling at me! Do you know how that makes me feel?! REALLY BAD. You hurt my feelings!! APOLOGIZE!!!"

Cadence was taken back. She never in her entire life imagined Flurry Heart lashing back at her. Not only that, Flurry was intimidating. She struck fear into Cadence that Cadence never knew she had. To be fair, she didn't have it. As an adult such fear didn't exist. But as a baby, Cadence was a little bundle of fear. As a result, miliseconds later she started getting tear-y eyed.

Flurry Heart could tell that she got the message and scooped up her baby mom. "There there mom. It's alright I forgive you. Just do one thing for me. Say your sorry."

Cadence shyly spoke up "Me sowwy Fwuwwy Hart..."

Flurry Heart giggled infectiously at that response. "Awwww, it's okay. Well, let's get you in a diaper mom. You must be really cold. I remember what it was like being naked."

Cadence blushed. This was so mortifying. "G-gud i-dwea Fwuwwy."

Flurry Heart then proceeded into what was quite possibly the craziest diaper changing ever. She knew what to do, but she didn't know what amount to use. So, she wound up lifting her mom's bottom, and applying an enormous amount of baby powder, making Cadence's bum snowy white. Then she slid a diaper underneath and strapped it in super tight. Strangely enough, Cadence felt great after this. She always was one for sensations and diaper changes by Flurry Heart allowed her to feel super snuggily wuggily.

Two thoughts formed in the recesses of Cadences' mind as a result of this changing experience. "Could I stay like this if I so wanted?" and "I wish Shining Armor was here to enjoy this too."
15533222222112111.title: Mommy and Baby Struggle When the Roles are Swapped

choices: The increase in love energy causes Shining Armor to return.
The increase in love energy causes an increase in guards.
155332222221121111.content:
Flurry Heart could see her mom's satisfaction from the diaper change and couldn't help but ask about it. "Sooooo... mom, how do you think I did for my first diaper change? Pretty good?"

Cadence blushed bright red and tried to give a more calm response "Ya-yes. Tank you Fwuwwy."

"Ahh shucks, don't feel nervous mom. I was a baby too. I know what it's like when you get a good diaper change. It's intoxicating."

After hearing her daughter use such a sophisticated word, Cadence just sighed and covered her face. She didn't want to see this anymore. That was until Flurry got her attention with another baby tactic.

Flurry Heart acted like her mom was invisible. "Oh wow.. Mom? Where'd you go?"

Cadence peeked out of right hoof to see Flurry. Within seconds, Flurry responded "There she is! How's my favorite mom ever doing?"

This snapped Cadence out of her fear and she uncovered her face, giggling hysterically. "Me am! Me am!" This was yet again another baby instinct taking command over poor little Cadence.

"Well, you know what great moms deserve?!"

Cadence tilted her head in adorable confusion "Wha?"

"An adorable blue ribbon to tie your mane silly! I saw pictures of your younger self with a blue ribbon when I was a baby."

"Oh... wewwy? Me no we-memba dat..." The more accurate reason for this was that Cadence gave up that memory in the age transfer.

Seconds later, the ribbon was on Cadence and Flurry Heart proceeded to cradle her mom again. This time she spoke to her in a bit of a belittling voice "So, mom? Are you hungwy? Does my little snooker-muffin want some bwakefast?!"

Cadence didn't really pay attention to the words, but rather the tone, and she loved the tone of Flurry's voice. So, she just replied "Yes pwease! Yes pwease!" with little understanding of what she was saying yes to.

Unbeknownst to Flurry or Cadence, this line of bonding was being subtly reflected throughout the empire. After Shining Armor had left, the love spreading from the crystal heart had diminished considerably, by about a third of it's previous power. But with the new experiences happening to Cadence, the princess of love, the crystal heart surged with an outrageous abundance of love. The crystal heart was pumping out about six times more love than its normal amount with Shining Armor present.

Even though it was early, many crystal ponies gathered around the center of the city, baffled at the change of events. The love surging from the heart brought with it a considerable amount of warmth to the Crystal Empire and cleared away the fog that covered it less than an hour ago.

The guards were just as confused as everybody else and, while it wasn't standard procedure, some decided to consult the princess immediately to give an answer to all.

Roughly six guards raced down the crystal hallways as Flurry levitated her mom with her to the kitchen.

"How's my wittle mommy wommy? Is she good?"

"Hehe! Yes me am!!"

"Aww, ya know, you really are better this wa-"

She was cut off by the guards that finally saw them down the hall. "HALT! WHO ARE YOU?!"

The sudden pouncing scared Cadence, causing her to hide her face in Flurry.

Flurry actually had a flash of motherly protection at the sight of this. "I am Flurry Heart. How dare you speak to me that way?!"

The guards raced down as she was talking and stopped upon sight of her. She was about the same height as her mother, meeting their height.

The guards were bewildered and only one had the nerve to speak up. "Ple-please explain your highness."

Flurry brushed off her anger and gave a enthusiastic reply "It's cool guys. It's me Flurry Heart. Don't you recognize me? Me and my mom had a little mishap in my room this morning and it caused us to swap ages. Now, my mom is an adorable wittle baby. Look!"

Flurry then levitated Cadence in front of the guards now shocked faces. There was a round of both terror and shock.

Cadence only teared up at this. It was one of the most embarrassing experiences ever. She was about to break out into wails, but Flurry anticipated and cradled her back in her hooves. "Awww, there there mom. It's alright." It's weird. In some ways, she was better at sensing her mom's outbreaks than her mom was at sensing hers.

The guards quickly apologized upon realizing they made the princess upset and apologized deeply. One spoke up though "Can you please announce this to the empire? Your subjects must know at once."

"Ah shucks guys, you can drop the authority act with me. After all, I'm only really a baby girl." While Flurry Heart didn't realize it, there was an unintended sexual connotation from that response. The guards nervously blushed, but tried to keep their composure.

"Gee, what scared you guys? Anywho, I'm going I'm going."

What now?
155332222221121111.title: Perhaps, Mommy and Baby are Better Role Swapped

choices: Shining Armor is unable to convince Flurry Heart to change her back
Shining Armor is turned into a baby himself to match her age
1553322222211211111.content:
Flurry Heart walked down towards the Crystal Heart area, instead of the normal royal balcony. Her preference for a more jovial approach to the citizens meant the she favored informality, unlike her mother.

After Flurry Heart opened the large decorated door, she saw a half circle of guards around it with just about every crystal pony trying to go through. Within seconds the chaos and calamity died down with blown away reactions. Most folks made the connection that Flurry Heart and Cadence swapped ages.

Flurry Heart was a little nervous with all the concerned eyes on her and disguised it with laughter. "Haha, hey everypony! I'm Flurry Heart here to alleviate your concerns. Ya see, my mom and I accidentally swapped ages earlier this morning." Flurry Heart then levitated Cadence in front of the crowd, which caused a far more embarrassing experience then what she just had down the hall. Of course, Flurry was quick to cradle her and calm her nerves. She even gave a motherly kiss for extra measure.

Several crystal ponies then asked "How did this happen?!"

Flurry Heart gave a fake smile. "Well, my mom was kinda ridiculous in this morning's diaper change. I didn't even have an accident, but she kept at it. So, I charged my horn and then she tried touching my horn with her horn to stop it. In the end, I casted a crazy age swap spell and the rest is history."
Flurry Heart walked down towards the Crystal Heart area, instead of the normal royal balcony. Her preference for a more jovial approach to the citizens meant the she favored informality, unlike her mother.

After Flurry Heart opened the large decorated door, she saw a half circle of guards around it with just about every crystal pony trying to go through. Within seconds the chaos and calamity died down with blown away reactions. Most folks made the connection that Flurry Heart and Cadence swapped ages.

Flurry Heart was a little nervous with all the concerned eyes on her and disguised it with laughter. "Haha, hey everypony! I'm Flurry Heart here to alleviate your concerns. Ya see, my mom and I accidentally swapped ages earlier this morning." Flurry Heart then levitated Cadence in front of the crowd, which caused a far more embarrassing experience then what she just had down the hall. Of course, Flurry was quick to cradle her and calm her nerves. She even gave a motherly kiss for extra measure.

Several crystal ponies then asked "How did this happen?!"

Flurry Heart gave a fake smile. "Well, my mom was kinda ridiculous in this morning's diaper change. I didn't even have an accident, but she kept at it. So, I charged my horn and then she tried touching my horn with her horn to stop it. In the end, I casted a crazy age swap spell and the rest is history."

There was a round of gasps and raised voices. "WHAT?! Then-then what will happen now?!"

Flurry Heart gave a confused expression. "Huh, what do you all mean?"

Many spoke up "Will you two stay this way?!!"

"I guess so, why? I mean I love being an adult and taking care of my mom. She seems to love it. Why not?"

One pony raised his voice "Well, what about your father?!"

"Oh right. Well, I'm sure my dad will understand?"

----------

On the other side of Equestria, word was already getting sent about a change in the Crystal Empire, but the complete story was given to Shining Armor. No pony really had the nerve to tell the prince, who didn't have such a sense of humor, that his wife and daughter swapped ages.

Shining Armor had just finished his meal and was off to the field where dragons were attacking their magic walls. Right as he was getting to the front lines, a guard stopped him. "Shining Armor, can I please have your attention?" For a private, this guy had quite the confidence in facing his superior.

Shining was a little confused. "Um, what seems to be the issue private?"

"Have you noticed the change to the skies?"

"Huh?" Shining Armor was just in a tent, and hadn't quite looked up. He then did as instructed and saw various shades of purple and pink cover the sky. "What the?!"

"Do not be concerned sir. This is from our allies, the Crystal Empire to be exact."

That response spun Shining Armor in multiple thought directions, but he maintained composure, albeit in a thinking pose. "Thank you Private. I'll think about what to do."

"No need sir. I'm a messenger from Princess Celestia. She's ordering you return home."

"What?! What about the our defenses?"

"Already taken care of sir. Sunburst has actually mastered that spell with some modifications, which means your free to go."

Shining Armor was stunned. He had never been relieved like this before. "Can I see him before I go? I need to give him some advice."

"No need. Just send him a letter and we'll have it over within the day."

"But I... Okay. I understand. My wife and daughter in danger."

The Private began to sweat a little bit. He had heard what happened, but he wasn't as good at keeping it a secret.

Shining Armor caught this. "You know something more? What is it? It's about my wife and daughter? What happened to them?"

"I-I am not allowed to say, sir."

Shining Armor aggressively headed out, racing to his tent. He didn't have time for that pony then! Fortunately, his things were already packed by another guard and he was led to the nearest train.

Along the way north to his home, Shining Armor's mind raced with anxious thoughts. 'Cadence and Flurry had their ages swapped? What in sam hill is going on? How did this? Who did this? Why?'

He then said to himself "Augh, who ever did this is going to pay. You better hope it wasn't you Discord."

After about a 5 hour trip, the train was passing into the Crystal Empire. Shining Armor was asleep and had to woken by a crystal guard. He fell asleep about an hour in and had a panic ridden slumber.

"Um, Shining Armor?" The guard then nudged him a little bit and Shining woke up. (Not a very heavy sleeper perhaps.)

"Wha? Am I home?"

"Yes sir. Come with me at once. Your wife and daughter need to see you."

"They're safe?!"

"Yes. Um, there is no immediate concern. Please just come with me."

Shining took a deep breath. "Ok."

He was led to Flurry Heart's room. After which, the guard left him alone and he quietly cracked the door open. He saw the backside of his now grown up daughter and a little pink coated baby playing with blocks, whom he presumed was Cadence. He also overheard a little of their conversation.

Cadence said in an adorably high pitched voice "An dis es da wub cas-wle!"

Flurry entertained Cadence's little imagination. "Ooo, is there anything special about it?'

"Hehe, yes Fwuwwy. Et whe-wa aw da ponies faw en wub!"

"Oooo, is that where you and dad met?"

Cadence giggled "May-be.. Me wis he wa hea-" She then cut herself off upon seeing her husband. "SHININ! YA BAK!!"

Shining's cheeks instantly turned bright red. "Um.. hi, you two."

"Dad!" Flurry Heart instantly got up, levitating Cadence to her right side. "You're back so soon. Why'd you come back?"

Shining immediately jumped on them with this peculiar question. "Why? Because you two swapped ages, that's why!"

Cadence started to tear up a little bit at this, but Flurry again cradled her to comfort. She then in a quiet but assertive tone said "Dad. What has gotten into you? That's not how you treat mom. She's sensitive you know."

Shining Armor became nervous "I-I I didn't mean it that way. I'm just confused. Please explain."
1553322222211211111.title: Daddy Hears Mommy is a Baby Now

choices: Twilight and Starlight come to the Crystal Empire to celebrate the change
Twilight and Starlight come to the Crystal Empire in concern over the change
15533222222112111112.content:
Flurry returned to her joyful self at that kind response. "Well, ya see, mom was giving me a diaper change as always this morning, but she was being really weird. I hadn't had an accident, but she kept up a oddly long changing. So, I powered my horn, she touched it, and then we swapped ages. That about wraps it up." Flurry Heart was insultingly casual in her tone of events.

Shining Armor was in shock by the end, paused and speechless.

"Uh dad, you ok?"

Then Cadence spoke up "Pwease no be mad Shy-nin. She nah mean it. Me ac-twy tinkin ta stay dis way."

That snapped Shining Armor out of it. "I-I don't know what to say. Cadence, you can't really propose something like that, can you?"

"Come on dad. It's a smart decision."

"What? What do you mean?"

"Well, she's happier this way and the empire has even more love magic spreading across Equestrian skies. It can even be used to fuel unicorn magic."

This was heavy. His wife was going to stay like this. And for good reasons? Protecting Equestria was his job. He wasn't about to argue against that or take away his love's joy. But he wasn't happy about any of this. He just sat on the floor, looking at the ground. "I don't know what to say..."

Flurry was going to but in, but Cadence signal to be lowered to the floor to talk one on one. So, Flurry did as instructed. Cadence slowly walked up to her husband with a sad expression. "Shy-nin..."

Shining looked up at his wife in defeat "yes?"

"Me stiw wub you. Me no wanna woose you. M-me sniff wub you."

"But I- what am I going to do?"

Cadence then hugged him "Sa-pa me de-ci-son..."

Flurry intervened. "Mom, Dad..."

The two nodded up to her.

With out any approval, Flurry then casted an age spell on Shining Armor, lifting him up with a bright yellow beam.

Shining Armor nervously asked "Wha what are you doing Flurry?"

"You'll be a lot happier at the same age as mom."

"Wait, NO?!"

It was too late. Milliseconds later a vortex spun around Shining, regressing him to babyhood at an astonishing rate.

Cadence simply said "Yay! Gud idea Fwuwwy!!" She was too infantile to realize the ethics of this.

Before a minute past, the yellow vortex faded leaving a baby white pony with a blue mane.

Shining Armor blinked with disbelief at the huge room and followed up with wails "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!'

Flurry just gave a motherly smile and levitated the two of them into her hooves. "There there dad, look around, look at mom. Doesn't she look cuute, you and her are now the same age."
15533222222112111112.title: Mommy and Daddy are Better as Babies.

choices: Flurry Heart speaks with Starlight privately and the two become friend mommies
Flurry Heart lets Starlight do the diaper change
155332222221121111122.content:
It was approaching late evening and Twilight and Starlight were on a train to the Crystal Empire. When Twilight had heard that Cadence and Flurry Heart swapped ages, she was overwhelmed with both concern and curiosity. She had heard that Flurry Heart initiated the spell and was hoping she could reverse things. Normally, she'd go with her friends, but there was a scary prospect ahead of her; Flurry Heart might try turning them into babies too. She told Starlight though, because her magical skills were an asset.

By the time they approached the Crystal Empire, the two of them noticed something different. The Crystal Heart was generating far more love than they said it was. They could feel it, about 3 times more so than they expected.

"Hey Twilight, does something feel off to you?"

Twilight anxiously replied "Yes. I have a bad feeling about this."

"What do you suppose it could mean?"

"Somehow the love has increased even further. I have a guess, but I hope it's not true."

"What's your guess?"

"Please can we not talk about it. It's making me anxious."

"Okay okay, sorry."

Once they got off the train, everypony and thing was glowing. Once they stepped off the train, they too started glowing.

The two looked at each other with concern and ran in the direction of the castle. As they approached the Crystal Heart, they could see it spinning rapidly. Two guards approached them and they were quick to guide them to the same room Shining Armor was led too. They didn't want to say that Shining Armor had entered though, for fear of what happened to him. It had been 10 minutes since he entered and he hadn't come out yet.

After the guards left them, Starlight bluntly pointed out "I understand the gravity of the situation, but this is a little ridiculous, don't you think?"

Twilight only took offense, prodding her. "Starlight, this is serious! Cadence could be gone forever. Please be more considerate."

Starlight sighed and said "K." That little response made her once again self-doubt her abilities.

Twilight opened the door normally, not bothering to hide the sound. She was too concerned.

Immediately, Flurry turned around with a now diapered Shining Armor and Cadence. "Oh hey there Aunt Twilight and Starlight! Why are you hear? Seems like all the fun ponies are coming by?"

Twilight gulped. "Flurry Heart, I'm here out of concern."

Flurry sighed "Augh, please don't tell me you came her just to say that what I did was wrong?"

"Well, I..."

"You did, didn't you. Why is it that no one trusts me with my parents? I know I really am a baby girl, but a little trust would go a long way."

Starlight could relate a little, showing nervousness to approach her.

Twilight on the other hoof, wasn't giving up. "Look Flurry, I understand that they look very cute, but what do they have to say about it?"

"Aunt Twilight! They love it! Why does everyone think being a baby is so bad?!"

After Flurry Heart, Cadence spoke up "It twu Twiwigh! Me wub dis! Me fee so much wub! Me wha ment ta do dis!"

Shining Armor followed up. "Twi-wy, me unda-stan ya con-san, bu me wanna stay baby ef Cay-dence das."

Cadence blushed, gently tapping Shining Armor's little shoulder "Aww, tanks honwy! Um Mama Fwuwwy, ca yo-wa wet me an Shy-nin pway fa da time be-win?"

Flurry Heart giggled "Of course mom!" and levitated her parents near the blocks.

Then Flurry Heart smugly looked at Twilight "See, they love it."

Twilight butted in "Somethings not right. I think their age may be affecting their thought patterns. Flurry, we have to turn them back now. Who knows how more they'll change."

Flurry was outraged "Aunt Twilight!!"

Twilight became incredibly nervous "What?"

"You just said that they're opinion is what matters, right?"

"Yees, but-"

"No buts! This is what they want. Why can't you accept that?"

"It's too unrealistic is all Flurry."

"Do you know what it's like being a baby?"

"Yes."

"Well, then you should know what I'm talking about!"

"I don't though for a reason."

"Yeah.. I know the reason. You haven't been a baby for quite some time. How about we change that?!"

Twilight prepared her horn after seeing her charge, but something happened. Flurry Heart paused time itself so that only Twilight and her were moving.

Twilight lost focus after seeing everything go still. "Wha? What did you do? Did you.. stop time?!"

"Yeah, Aunt Twilight. With the magic I got from my mom, I've learned a lot of spells quickly."

"Wow, why'd you stop time though?"

"To distracted you."

Right then and there, Flurry Heart blasted Twilight with the same age spell, causing her too to regress. Tears welled up from Twilight, "Why are you doing this? We love you...?"

As Twilight was regressing from the vortex, Flurry answered her question "I'm doing this to be on the different side of it all for a change. Being a mommy is a ton of fun. So many cute faces and picture worthy moments. It's enchanting. That's why."

By the time Flurry Heart finished her statement, Twilight was at the same age as Cadence and her brother. They were oddly the same age for the first time ever now and being taken of by her niece. How more crazy could things get.

Right after the regression finished, Flurry unfroze time. Shining Armor and Cadence weren't paying enough attention to notice, even if Twilight were to wail (which is exactly what she did)

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!"

Starlight was freaked. In just a millisecond, her mentor went from charging her horn to wailing as a foal.

Before Starlight could ask anything, Flurry levitated Twilight up to her face "It's okay Aunt Twily, being a baby is a ton of fun, you'll see." and cradled her, calming her down.

Starlight quivered in fear "How-how'd you do that?"

Despite the menacing vibe she gave off, Flurry Heart responded genuinely as she was cradling her aunt. Then again, Starlight hadn't done anything wrong yet. "Oh nothing too fancy, just a time stop spell followed by my age spell."

Starlight gulped in fear "Wh-why?"

Flurry Heart vented a little bit at this question. "Well, she was just being such a buzzkill. My mom and dad are having a blast and she's gotta come in here and try to ruin it. It's just so.. so... rude."

"B-but did she deserve it?"

Flurry rolled her eyes. "Oh come on please, don't you that start too. You just saw me turn Aunt Twilight into a baby. I won't mind turning you into a baby either."

Starlight was frozen in fear. She didn’t know what to do, defend Twilight and turn into a baby or don’t defend Twilight and see what happens.

Flurry Heart chuckled “I see the cat’s got your tongue. Well, while you ponder over it, I’m gonna give my aunt a fresh new diaper.”

Twilight was startled by that response "Da-diapa?"

"Well, I'm not going to let you go around naked silly! You need something in case you have an accident."

At that statement, Twilight started wailing again, this time louder than before. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!"

Flurry resorted to her normal cradle technique, but it did nothing. Then she tried singing "There there Twilight, it'll all be-"

"AHHH! It's not working! NOTHING I'M DOING IS WORKING! That's it Aunt Twilight! You just lost your memory!"

Before she casted her spell, Starlight casted a stop spell on her. "DON'T YOU DO THAT TO MY MENTOR!"

"Then how am I supposed to stop her crying!!!"

Starlight took a deep breath. "I'll do that."

Flurry Heart watched as Starlight levitated Aunt Twilight out of her frozen hooves and into hers. Twilight felt a change, but continued to wail.

Starlight remained on task and did a simple action. She hugged Twilight, keeping the hug hold with no sign of letting go. As if it were a magic trick, Twilight's wails quickly shrank to tears and then sniffles. "Sh-she wa gonna sniff gonna sniff-"

Flurry was amazed at how easy Starlight had Twilight under control.

"Shhh shh, it's okay Twilight. I got you. I won't let her do anything to you that you don't want to do."

"We-we-weawwy?"

Starlight smiled down at her mentor "That's what friends do, isn't it?'

That intiated a chuckle from Twilight "Haha, twu..."

After her laughing stopped, Twilight looked up at Starlight. "Wha am me gonna do? Me can-ta be ah baby.."

Starlight just laughed to that, causing Twilight to get nervous. "Why yowa wa-waughing...?"

"Because you're Twilight Sparkle. You've defeated so many evil foes, but you think you can't do this. It's just, I don't believe you."

"Yowa no unda-stan. Me wost eba-wey wing..."

"Are you still friends with some of the best ponies in Equestria?"

"Yes."

"Then what's there to worry about? You haven't lost anything. In fact, you've gained something."

Twilight tilted her head in confusion. "Wha es dat?"

Starlight giggled "Cute-ness" and followed it up with tickles.

Twilight laughed, falling for the tickles completely, but she also was happy. Her fears were slowly but surely stalled. In the mist of the laughter, she said "Can ya haha gib me ah haha diapa chan.. haha, me no haha wanna hab ac-sid-ent."

Starlight stopped tickling, but Twilight kept laughing. While Twilight continued to laugh, Starlight's stop spell ended.

What now?
155332222221121111122.title: Mommy, Daddy, and now Aunty! So Many New Babies!

choices: The three have fun time and then accidents
1553322222211211111221.content:
Flurry quickly stopped time again after she was free. Starlight was zoned out a little, but quickly realized Twilight stopped moving. "Twilight!"

Flurry chuckled "She's stopped silly. I stopped time for a second."

Starlight delicately carried her mentor as she walked to Flurry. "Please don't get rid of her memory.. I don't know what I'd do without her..." Silent tears came from Starlight's eye sockets at this.

"What are you? Crazy?! I wouldn't do that!"

"But y-you-"

"I was, but that was before I saw how great your parenting skills were."

Starlight blushed, but kept listening.

"As long as you take care of her, I'm not going to do a thing. I just didn't want her ruining our fun. But that's not exactly why I stopped time."

"Wh-why did you?" Starlight stuttered.

"I wanted to ask you a question."

"A question?"

"Yes. Do you see my aunt as a mother figure to you?"

Starlight's cheeks turned bright red from embarrassment. "What kind of question is that?!"

Flurry giggled "No need to be so serious silly. I'm asking, because of how you cared for her."

"Go on.."

"Well, there's not much to it. I just think that children can be better parents to their parents than their parents. That make any sense? It's like. I think I'm a better mommy to my mom then my mom was to me, because I'm her daughter."

"What makes you think that's the case?"

"Hmm.. good question. My first diaper change of her was to her satisfaction, I always know when she's about to wail, and I'm able to keep her emotions down generally."

"What about for your dad?"

"My dad is.. well, he's different. He's probably satisifed with my diaper change style, but he likes to hide that. He also tends to call my name before wailing, signalling me to calm him down. Oh and his emotions are generally positive, but they change a lot. So, after my description though of my mom, can you come clean about Twilight as a mother figure?"

Starlight took a deep breath. "It's true."

"Ha! I knew it! I'm so good!"

Starlight continued. "Twilight has played a much more active role in my life than my parents ever did and takes care of me, sorta like a parent. I don't really know because my parents were away so much."

"Awww, Starlight, she's totally your adopted mom and you are her adopted daughter. You know what that makes us?!"

"Um.. cousins?"

"YEP! And not just any cousins, we can also be best friend mommies and do all sorts of things playdates for our parents!"

Starlight didn't know what to do. Was it right to mommy her mentor?

As she pondered, Flurry jumped in "I won't ever judge you. I know what you did and I think you're tons of fun! Not to mention we can talk magic together!"

Starlight was caught off guard "What? How do you know all that?!"

"I've been paying attention Starlight." This was actually wrong. She simply stole the memory from her mother.

"Wow.. you are, one of the nicest ponies I've met. But what will Sunburst and all of my other friends think."

"Come on mare, we got this! I can get you and Sunburst to hook up even!"

Starlight became even more red in the face. "How do you know that?!"

"Starlight, Starlight.. He's been my royal crystallize for a while. He talks about you, like a lot."

Starlight became happy for a second there, but held back "He does?!"

"Absolutely! The only issue he says is that you don't live nearby."

Starlight's hormones started getting the best of her at this point, just as Flurry hoped. "Wait, you don't suppose I could come live her do you?"

"Ooo.. That's a great idea! That way our little young parents could see each other all the time. I'll hook you up with a great place."

"Wow.. you'd do that for me?"

"Of course! I want a mommy friend ya know. I don't want to be disturbing the little ones' fun all the time. That's no fun for either of us."

"Good point."

"So, come on Starlight, let's see you change Twilight's diaper now!"

Starlight blushed and Flurry undid the time spell.

While Twilight finished up her laughing, Starlight put her on the changing table.

Twilight was a little nervous after feeling the soft changing table. "Me no kno.. pahaps we shud way-ta."

Starlight asked her a little "Oh come on Twilight, can you give me one chance? You might like it even."

Twilight giggled at that prospect "Haha, okay, bu if me no wike it, no maw"

"Got it."

Starlight started cautiously, raising Twilight's hind hooves gradually and then gently tapping the baby powder until a right amount was on Twilight's bum. Then she slid a diaper under and strapped the diaper in nice and tug.

Twilight was smiling with glee by the end. "Dat wa GWATE!"

Starlight was taken a back by Twilight's extreme reaction. "Really? I was so slow though."

"Bu dat's da bes apwoch, et mean ya wan me ta be happy. An an it fee so gud becaus of dat." It was interesting. Twilight's focus seemed to be more on what the changing meant, with a little focus on soothingness."

Starlight giggled "Thanks Twilight. That's a good analysis of the diaper changing. Wanna go play with Cadence and Shining Armor now?"

"Yes peese!"

Starlight smiled motherly and levitated her over. Meanwhile, Flurry Heart was giving a huge smile, as if Starlight passed some mommy test.

Cadence and Shining Armor had built a small castle out of the blocks by the time Twilight came over.

Cadence smiled big and wide at seeing Twilight. "Twi-wite! Yowa baby too? Dat aw-sum!" The two babies then did their little greeting, which was super adorable as babies.

"Sun-shyne Sun-shyne! Wady Bugs Awake! Cwap ya hoobs an do aw witta shake!"
"Sun-shyne Sun-shyne! Wady Bugs Awake! Cwap ya hoobs an do aw witta shake!"

The two grown up ponies practically died of cuteness after the two shook their diapered bums.

"Awwwwwwww!"
"Awwwwwwww!"

The two babies giggled at their mommies reactions.

Shining Armor didn't seem that happy though and after they finished he walked up to her and asked "Why yowa baby?"

"Huh?"

"Me wanna no why yowa became baby"

The parents suddenly became a little tense at this, hoping things wouldn't go south. Twilight struggled to give an answer, but Cadence jumped in for her.

"Why you bein so mean?"

Shining obviously took offense to that. "Me am not!"

"Yea huh! Twi-wite an me wha enjoy-win aw sels an an den you gots make ha fee bad. Meanie!"

"Me am not meanie! Me *sniff* not.. Me jus..."

"Jus wha?"

"JEWOUS!"

Cadence was gonna lash back, but Twilight tapped Shining's shoulder.

"Shy-nin.. me sowwy... Come on Staw-wite. Wet's go..."

Shining Armor felt bad, really bad.

"No way-ta, me no me-nit. Me sowwy..."

Twilight then hugged him back "It kay!" and Cadence hugged as well. It was a three way hug!
1553322222211211111221.title: Mommy and Daddy Now Have A New 'Pwaymate'

choices: The little one's have a last minute set of accidents before sleep
The little one's are fast to fall asleep.
15533222222112111112211.content:
During the hug, the three babies' tummies growled in unison. This made sense, the three hadn't eaten for a while that day.

Flurry Heart giggled at the growls "Awwwww, are my babies hungwy?"

Cadence and Shining Armor both lifted up their hooves "Yes Mommy Fwuwwy Hart!"

"Haha! Then come with me my little ones!" Flurry Heart then levitated them into the air around her.

Twilight seemed nervous, so Starlight approached her. "Twilight, is everything alright?"

"Yea.. me jus a wittle-"

"Hungry?"

"Yea! How'd you know?"

Starlight chuckled a little to herself "I can hear your tummy silly. Come on. Let's get you situated. Mentors need food too you know."

Starlight then did the same and levitated Twilight in the air near her.

Starlight and Flurry then walked to the kitchen as the three babies giggled and converse.

Cadence was the the first to start conversation "So, Twi-wite, wha ya fava-wit pawt abowt babyhood?"

Twilight adorably pondered for a second. "Um.. hmm.. wew, maaybe da wak ob wa-spon-sa-biwities."

"Oooh gud wun! Wha abowt you-wa Shynin Awmaw?"

Shining smiled "Bewin wit me wub!"

"Hehe, you-wa so siwwy. Bes hubby eba! Fa me, et got ta be habbin Fwuwwy as me mommy. She so gud wit me fee-wins!"

The two mommies giggled at their baby parents' thoughts and next thing they knew, all of them arrived in the kitchen.

Flurry then magically poofed two new high chairs, one for Shining Armor and another for Twilight. Cadence was put in the one previously for Flurry Heart.

As talkative as the babies were on the way there, they were rather quiet just making "mmm" sounds with each spoon of mashed carrots and potatoes.

As they did this, the new mothers talked among themselves.

"Hey Starlight, I've been thinking, why leave this all to us?"

"Huh?"

"I mean like why not do something about this. Change Equestria for the better."

Starlight was getting nervous, but kept her cool. "What do you mean?"

"I mean, let's fix more relationships. All parents, or mothers at least, should be turned into babies and their children should look after them."

Starlight gulped. She didn't know what to do, so she just agreed. I mean, she loved taking care of Twilight, but this seemed a bit extreme. "Okay. Let's do it."

info.brief_description: Make parents from cartoons, anime, comics, video games and other sources younger!
info.description:
Here's where you can regress the mother and/or father of certain characters in cartoons, anime, and other media formats, and then work with the concept. Turn them into kids so that their children could play with them, turn them into babies so that their children could look after them or even take advantage of them, or you can even have the children join with them somehow. Either way, this can go in any direction you want, just as long as parent age regression is the focus.

DA RULES
*If it involves magic or technology for the effect, then you can do other effects to the characters as well, but stick with age regression.
*No killing off characters.
*Mainly a characters' parents will be regressed, but other characters can get regressed as well, if desired.
*Try to build a story. Put some effort in describing things, unless you're giving more options.

Other than that, have fun.
